events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our tech team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your background and skills in software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed positively with the candidate, covering experience and motivation for the Software Engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, confirming availability and enthusiasm for the technical interview.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the Software Engineer position on June 10th at 2 PM UTC with the engineering panel.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
Following a successful technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled for June 15th at 10 AM to discuss culture fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed, and the candidate showed excellent alignment with our company values and workplace culture.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date, reflecting their experience and expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the company as a Software Engineer.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date, finalizing the recruitment process successfully.
Onboarding activities have begun with the new hire, including equipment setup, documentation, and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed, and the Software Engineer has officially joined the engineering team.
